Class TowerBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • TowerBase

  • public class TowerBase
extends greenfoot.Actor
    This class is the base of the tower that can create any Tower in the game. A TowerBase has a tower type, a number of upgrades and an exp value. When creating a tower, the variables used to create it are passed on to the tower.
    Version:
    January 16th 2019
    Author:
    Kevin Biro

      Creates a tower base with a specified type, number of upgrades and exp.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TowerBase

        public TowerBase(int towerType,
                 boolean canDrag,
                 boolean valid,
                 int num,
                 int xp)
        Creates a tower base with a specified type, number of upgrades and exp.
        Parameters:
        towerType - The type of the tower that will get created on spawn
        canDrag - Whether or not the tower created can be dragged
        valid - Whether or not the tower placement is valid
        xp - The current exp of the tower when created.

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        Constantly checks if its location is valid in the world and removes the towerbase if not.
        Overrides:
        act in class greenfoot.Actor

      • addedToWorld

        public void addedToWorld(greenfoot.World w)
        When the towerBase is added to the world, it creates a tower based on its tower type. The variables used to construct the towerbase are used to construct the tower
        Overrides:
        addedToWorld in class greenfoot.Actor
        Parameters:
        w - The world that the tower is being added to

      • checkAndRemove

        public void checkAndRemove()
        Checks if the tower is in a valid location when let go and removes it from the world if not.
